items.title: Construction Industry.
items.content: Worked for 10+ years in the construction industry for several large European construction companies. Responsible for integrating legacy applications with the SAP ERP system, financial reporting and streamling business processess.
items.tech_stack: SAP, ABAP, SAP Fiori, JavaScript, Node.js, ThreeJS, BPM, MQSI, Mercator, EDI, XML, JSON

items.title: Minzee Skin Analyser
items.content: Helped developing the Skin Analyser. Web application with API for third party access and front-end with React framework. Python desktop application with Tkinter.

items.title: wordPOS
items.content: wordPOS creates seamless synchronization between WooCommerce and Loyverse POS. Developed together with WebifySEO.

items.title: ADCM
items.content: ADCM offers bespoke transaction and consultancy for the alternative debt and FinTech scene. Automated their email process.

items.title: Syncwerk GmbH
items.content: Design and implemented a contract management system using Django and Rest API. Customer facing front-end build with Angular.

items.title: Carbonie
items.content: Upgrade existing Django app and MySQL database. Code cleanup and advice on improving security.

items.title: Feedlur
items.content: Startup. Developing a Social News Network. It had a successful launch but did not get enough traction.

items.title: AM Real Estate
items.content: Design of a new system to easily manage and consolidate the administration of the 200+ subsidiaries. Including an interactive visual representation of the subsidiaries legal structure.

items.title: BAM Construction UK
items.content: Responsible for all SAP developments and design within BAM Construction UK. Among others creating an interface with Inland revenue.
items.tech_stack: SAP, ABAP, SAP Modules PS FI CO SD MM EDI

items.title: British Council
items.content: Design and implementation Travelex interface for payment cards and purchase order approval workflow.
items.tech_stack: SAP, ABAP, SAP Modules PS FI MM EDI, NodeJS, Javascript

items.title: No code programming
items.content: Hired by IBM to work on a project to generate SAP programs from BPM models.

items.title: Wyass & Freytag
items.content: Improving project management with focus on cashflow and planning. Implementation subcontractor reporting system.

items.title: Softador
items.content: Finalizing and bringing internally created debt management web application to production. Backend Django (Python) with React front-end.

items.title: Hans Anders opticians
items.content: Responsible for integrating SAP ERP with their store POS systems. Managing the integration for more than 350 stores in Europe.
